name: Donald Nowak
story: Maciej Koz≈Çowski is a quiet man who lives alone in a rural village in Poland. He enjoys reading books and taking long walks in the countryside, often stopping to admire the beauty of nature. He works as a farmer to support himself and spends most of his time tending to his crops and livestock. Despite his solitary lifestyle, Maciej is content with his simple way of life and has no desire for anything more.
